`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.p,{children:["If you're using MDX in your Next.js project, ",(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.code,{children:"useMDXComponent"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/my_code/yoo-page-doc/content/docs/500-reference/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-48b52ad7-5d54-4e97-ae1f-0fe3abb51ee9.mdx",lineNumber:25,columnNumber:46},this)," makes it easy to render MDX in your layouts."]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/simao/my_code/yoo-page-doc/content/docs/500-reference/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-48b52ad7-5d54-4e97-ae1f-0fe3abb51ee9.mdx",lineNumber:25,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-fragment":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#282c34"},"data-language":"jsx","data-theme":"default",raw:`import { useMDXComponent } from 'next-contentlayer/hooks'
import { allDocs } from 'contentlayer/generated'
import Button from '../components/Button'

const mdxComponents = {
  Button,
}

export default function DocPage({ doc }) {
  const MDXContent = useMDXComponent(doc.body.code)

  return (
    <div>
      <h1>{doc.title}</h1>
      <MDXContent components={mdxComponents} />
    </div>
  )
}

export const getStaticProps = ({ params: { slug } }) => {
  const doc = allDocs.find((doc) => doc._raw.flattenedPath === slug)
  return { props: { doc } }
}
